summary_en: Freska is a rapidly growing company that offers home cleaning services and is looking for new team members to join as home cleaners. They provide high-quality training and a secure employment opportunity for those starting their careers or as experienced housekeepers with ambition. The company values the people, growth, and responsibility. They offer a career path, daily support, and opportunities for career advancement. As an employee, you will get a collective agreement, paid overtime, paid travel time, exercise allowance, and the chance to influence your salary through bonuses. You will have a permanent work schedule and will work in an environment where attention to detail is fundamental. As a home cleaner, you will dust, vacuum, and mop client's homes. The ideal candidate should speak Swedish or English, have a valid work permit, work flexible hours, and possess a driver's license and a car. No prior experience as a cleaner is required. The application process involves applying, chatting with Hubert, interviewing, training, and eventually starting the job.

title: Home cleaners to Freska Gothenburg!
description:
Do you have experience in home cleaning and want to work within a company that gives the opportunity to grow and develop? Or are you in the beginning of your career and want to work in a company that offers high quality training and a safe employment? Apply to become one of our amazing home cleaners!
Freska - More than just a cleaning company ğŸ’™
Freska is one of the fastest growing companies with one goal in mind; to make Freska the best, most recommended workplace for service workers in Europe. In fact, our values; People first, Growth and Responsibility symbolize ways that we are working to make Freska a better workplace. Your day to day work, future goals and ambitions matter to us. Among other things we have developed a career path for our home cleaners as well as a support system to try to make everyday work life run as smoothly as possible. No matter if this is a job for you who wants to advance in your career, a safe employment or even start your first job here in Sweden, we are here for you!
We have come a long way to reach our goal and are always striving to find ways to improve. So far we have the possibility to offer our employees:
Collective agreement
Health benefits
Paid travel time between customers
Career opportunities
Training and coaching in home cleaning
A tight-knit team with a team leader to support you in the daily work
Immediate support from the office during your working day
Possibility to affect your salary through bonuses
Steady schedule that locks seven days prior
Overtime is always paid every month, no timebank!
A part-time contract starting from 50% with possibility to work more
Unlimited amount of coffee and chats in the office

About the job ğŸ‘‡
You will work in our customers most beloved place - their home. A home cleaning includes dusting, vacuuming and mopping. It is of great advantage if you have a sense of details. Your primary work tool will be our Freska Pro app where you will be able to see your schedule, customer information and general information about Freska.
With that being said, being a home cleaner also comes with some responsibility, therefore we are looking for someone who:
Speaks Swedish or English
Can work flexibly between our working hours 07.00-18.00.
Has a valid working permit
Has a driving license and access to a car, advantage but not a requirement
Has experience in cleaning, advantage but no requirement

So where do we go from here?
1. Apply!
2. Chat to our friend Hubert so we can get to know you better
3. Book your time and come to the office for an interview
4. Show us your cleaning skills
5. Youâ€™re hired!
6. Watch our digital onboarding
7. Come to the office for an onboarding
8. Go for training with your team leader
9. Start working, good luck!
Apply now!
summary_en: Freska, a cleaning company, is seeking experienced and entry-level home cleaners who want to work in a company that values growth, development, training, and a safe work environment. The company has a career path for its cleaners and a support system to offer a better work life. It offers various benefits, including health benefits, training and coaching in home cleaning, a team leader to support daily work, immediate support from the office, bonuses affecting salary, a steady schedule, lucrative overtime payment, flexible working hours, and a part-time contract starting at 50% with a chance to work more. The candidate should have a valid working permit, speak English or Swedish, and have a driving license (not necessary). The cleaning job involves dusting, vacuuming, and mopping, and the candidate should be detail-oriented. The application process involves applying, talking to a representative, going to the office for an interview, showing cleaning skills, attending digital onboarding and office onboarding, and ultimately starting to work. Interested candidates can apply now for the position.

summary_en: Nova Omsorg, a privately-owned home care company, is seeking candidates who are passionate about care and possess the ability to improve peopleâ€™s lives every day. The role involves working independently in clients' homes, providing care, and ensuring the clients' needs and wishes are met. The company stresses the importance of creating a trusting and respectful relationship with clients. The successful candidate should have excellent Swedish language skills, a background in home care, and a valid driving license. The position requires working within a small team, which emphasizes collaboration and mutual support. Nova Omsorg believes that a pleasant and supportive work environment is essential for providing quality care to the elderly. Therefore, the company is committed to creating a positive work culture, including comfortable offices and attentive management. summary_en: HjÃ¤lp Hemma is a growing company with development opportunities focused on improving the working and personal life conditions of people. They are seeking a new cleaning staff to work independently across the whole Stockholm area. The company offers an attractive workplace with collective agreements, health and wellness grants, and various employee benefits, as well as a strong social community. The candidate must have at least one year of documented experience in cleaning private households, be able to communicate in Swedish or English (Polish is also acceptable), and have high social competence. The candidate must also not have any criminal records registered with the police. The job offers a flexible and autonomous work style.
